properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 1 at 2:09AM PST until February 2 at 1:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 30 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and seas 13 to 16 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to
25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 10 to 12 feet at 13
seconds expected. For the Storm Watch, northwest winds 25 to
35 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and seas 14 to 16 feet at 13
seconds possible.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM to 1 PM PST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 3 AM PST
Sunday. For the Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through
Sunday evening.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare to remain in port, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions before conditions
deteriorate.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY... ...STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
